about_the_game:
A shooting game by a SIKIGAMI master (the shaman). Climb mountains to gain power and stop the scheme of demon!

【System]
Vertical 2D shooting game in which players switch between four SIKIGAMIs and fight using four patterns of shots and bombs. Power-ups can be obtained by acquiring dropped items from enemies. In addition, bonus scores are earned by continuously defeating enemies without being hit by bullets and by defeating groups of enemies together.



【Features】
・Tutorial + 3 stages.
・Difficulty level changes depending on stage progression.
・Four SIKIGAMIs that can be switched during the progress.
・Power-ups based on score.

【Story】
“Tomoharu Abe,” who was addicted to gambling as usual, suddenly noticed that an evil spirit began to drift around him. According to a deity with whom he has a close relationship, there is a demon who is planning to use the power of “mountains” in Japan. Mt Fuji is the highest mountain in Japan, and the goal is to climb it, train yourself, and aim for the enemy.

【Main Characters】

Tomoharu Abe: The main character. He is a descendant of a family of shaman. Loves to gamble.
Toda: One of the SIKIGAMI. She shoots powerful bullets.
Tenko: One of the SIKIGAMI. She shoots bullets with speed and penetrating power.
Tenku: One of the SIKIGAMI. He shoots over a wide area.
Rikugo. One of the SIKIGAMI. She shoots bullets that track the enemy.

name: Climb The Bullet

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10/11
  • Processor: i9
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows11
  • Processor: i10
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A shooting game by a shaman. Climb mountains to gain power and stop the scheme of demon. Vertical 2D shooting game in which players switch between four skills and fight using four patterns of shots and special move.
